T02bsu025_u:1: Nairātmyaparipṛcchā nāma mahāyānasūtram |. atha te tīrthikā upalambhadṛṣṭayaḥ savikalpāḥ savitarkā mahāyānikamupasṛtya sādarakṛtāñjalipuṭā nairātmyapraśnaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - nairātmakaṃ śarīramiti kulaputra sarvajñena nirdiśyate yadi śarīraṃ nairātmakam, paramātmā na vidyate |
T02bsu025_u:2: tat kasmātsakāśādete hasitaruditakrīḍitakrodhamānerṣyāṃpaiśunyādayaḥ samutpadyante? tadasmākaṃ saṃdehaṃ mocayitumarhati bhagavān - kimasti śarīre paramātmā, kiṃ vā nāsti?
T02bsu025_u:3: mahāyānikāḥ prāhuḥ - mārṣāḥ, śarīre paramātmā astītyucyate, na hi nāstīti
T02bsu025_u:6: yadyasti, tatkathaṃ mārṣāḥ keśanakhadantacarmaromasirāmāṃsāsthimedamajjāsnāyuplīhāntranālaśiraḥkaracaraṇāṅgasakalaśarīre sa bāhyābhyantare vicāryamāṇe na dṛśyate paramātmā?
T02bsu025_u:7: tīrthikāḥ prāhuḥ - na dṛśyate kulaputra paramātmā |
T02bsu025_u:10: mahāyānikāḥ prāhuḥ - na mārṣā divyacakṣuṣo 'pi paśyanti |
T02bsu025_u:11: yasya na varṇo na rūpaṃ na saṃskāraḥ, tatkathaṃ dṛśyate?
T02bsu025_u:16: saṃbhavanti? tena nāstīti vaktuṃ na pāryate |
T02bsu025_u:18: tīrthikāḥ prāhuḥ - yadi kulaputra nocyate astīti vā nāstīti vā,
T02bsu025_u:20: mahāyānikāḥ prāhuḥ - na mārṣāḥ kiṃcidālambanaṃ bhavati |
T02bsu025_u:24: tīrthikāḥ prāhuḥ - yadyevaṃ kulaputra, tadete hasitaruditakrīḍitakrodhamānerṣyāpaiśunyādayaḥ kathaṃ draṣṭavyāḥ?
T02bsu025_u:26: tīrthikāḥ prāhuḥ - kīdṛśī maya, kīdṛśaḥ svapnaḥ, kidṛśa indrajāla iti?
T02bsu025_u:27: mahāyānikāḥ prāhuḥ - upalakṣaṇamātraṃ mayā agrāhā, pratibhāsamātraṃ svapnaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāsvarūpaḥ, indrajālaḥ kṛtrimaprayogaḥ |
T02bsu025_u:29: punaraparaṃ dvau bhedau vinirdiṣṭau yaduta saṃvṛtiḥ paramārthaśca |
T02bsu025_u:32: evaṃ jīvaḥ puruṣaḥ pudgalaḥ kārakaḥ vedakaḥ |
T02bsu025_u:35: paraḥ, evaṃ na jīvo na pudgalaḥ na puruṣaḥ na kārakaḥ na vedakaḥ na dhanaṃ
T02bsu025_u:44: muktimārgaṃ na paśyanti andhā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ |
T02bsu025_u:47: paramārthaṃ na jānanti bhavo yatra nirudhyate |
T02bsu025_u:50: bhavaṃ cyutiṃ tathā loke punarāyānti yānti ca || 6 ||
T02bsu025_u:54: cyutirasti ca sarveṣāṃ tatsarvaṃ saṃvṛteḥ phalam || 8 ||
T02bsu025_u:56: punaste narakaṃ yānti tatsarvaṃ saṃvṛteḥ phalam || 9 ||
T02bsu025_u:63: na kāṭhinyaṃ na ca mṛdutvaṃ na coṣṇaṃ naiva śītalam |
T02bsu025_u:64: na saṃsparśaṃ na ca grāhyaṃ bodhicittasya lakṣaṇam || 13 ||
T02bsu025_u:65: na dīrghaṃ nāpi vā hrasvaṃ na piṇḍaṃ na trikoṇakam |
T02bsu025_u:66: na kṛśaṃ nāpi na sthūlaṃ bodhicittasya lakṣaṇam || 14 || ( Nparipṛ,
T02bsu025_u:68: na śveta nāpi raktaṃ ca na kṛṣṇaṃ na ca pītakam |
T02bsu025_u:76: sarvaṃ ca tena sādṛśyaṃ niḥsāraṃ budbudopamam |
T02bsu025_u:80: abhrāntare yathā vidyut kṣaṇādapi na dṛśyate |
T02bsu025_u:82: krīḍitaṃ hasitaṃ nityaṃ jalpitaṃ ruditaṃ tathā |
T02bsu025_u:83: nṛtyaṃ gītaṃ tathā vādyaṃ sarvaṃ svapnopamaṃ hi tat || 22 ||
T02bsu025_u:85: svapnaṃ ca cittasaṃkalpaṃ cittaṃ ca gaganopamam || 23 ||
T02bsu025_u:87: sa sa rvapāpanirmuktaḥ prāpnoti paramaṃ padam || 24 ||
T02bsu025_u:92: atha te tīrthikāstuṣṭā vikalparahitāstadā bhāvanāṃ samādhāya mahāyānayajñalābhino 'bhūvanniti
